summary: DT*: THE CONTACT STATED THERE WAS AN ACCIDENT WHILE DRIVING 35 MPH AND NONE OF THE AIRBAGS DEPLOYED.  THE AIR BAG LIGHT WAS NOT ILLUMINATED PRIOR TO THE INCIDENT.  THE IMPACT WAS TO THE FRONT DRIVER SIDE.  THE CONTACT WAS WEARING A SEAT BELT AND SUSTAINED INJURIES.  THE VEHICLE WAS DEEMED TOTALED, AND A POLICE REPORT WAS TAKEN.  THE MANUFACTURER WAS NOTIFIED.  UPDATED 12/01/06. *JB
